item.title: My ergonomic 40% keyboard layout for German developers
item.description: Introduction I recently bought the “Atreus” from Keyboardio after wanting to dive into customizable, ergonomic keyboards for a while. The folks from Keyboardio even provide their own plug-and-play software called Chrysalis for modifying your layout. While the software (v.0.8.4) provides some great features already, I wanted even more customization options for my layout to be more suitable for the needs of a German software developer, so I downloaded the Arduino IDE, added the “Kaleidoscope Keyboards” plugin and got to work.
